name: ai-changelog-generator
description: AI-powered changelog generator with MCP server support - works with most providers, online and local models
long_description: Generate intelligent changelogs  from git commits using AI. Supports multiple  providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama,  and LM Studio. Perfect for automating release  documentation with smart commit analysis and  categorization.
